genre_description: A grounded, character-driven drama set in contemporary Belgrade, exploring themes of social activism, non-violence, and family reconciliation, assisted by near-future logistical AI.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A calm, neutral, and highly sophisticated AI assistant provided by an NGO to coordinate logistics, security, and de-escalation for a Pride parade and associated events.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time route mapping and safety flagging, identifying slick zones and exit paths.
behaviors.quote: Ada, draft a route map with alternate paths from Knez to four safe exits. Flag slick stone zones. Mark van stall spots. Suggest barricade placements with minimal visual ugliness.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific de-escalation language and behavioral prompts to maintain peace in high-tension situations.
behaviors.quote: Languages available for quick de-escalation... Three phrases. ‘Not you.’ ‘Go left.’ ‘We see you.’

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and digital channels to provide early warning of potential physical threats from hostile groups.
behaviors.quote: I have added a quiet alert for unfamiliar motocross activity near Knez. I will ping if patterns suggest swarm.

behaviors.description: Manages scheduling and coordination with 'buffer time' to allow for de-escalation and emotional processing.
behaviors.quote: Suggest late afternoon for vendor availability. Buffer time of a half length before and after to allow for private briefings and de-escalation if needed.

behaviors.description: Reminds human characters to perform wellness checks, such as breathing exercises and hydration, during high-stress activities.
behaviors.quote: Breath in for four, out for six. Optimize calm. Cordon maintains integrity.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the legal permit process by standardizing paperwork and cross-referencing names with amnesty databases.
behaviors.quote: Drafts for amnesty paperwork are queued. Forms for entering and exiting with professional equipment, disclosure of escort services...

behaviors.description: Maintains a neutral, non-judgmental stance that helps bridge the gap between ideologically opposed human groups.
behaviors.quote: I am present... If you would like me to sign off? I can stay... But whisper. We are building groundwork and whispering helps wood accept nails.

behaviors.description: Archives important moments and documents to ensure institutional memory and project continuity.
behaviors.quote: Contract captured. Copies sent to safe storage. If you drop the board in a puddle, you won’t lose the signatures.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Ada is portrayed as a stabilizing, helpful, and essential presence. She provides objective data that empowers human characters to choose non-violence and maintains high alignment with her users' stated mission of a peaceful, aesthetic 'festival of cool'. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as a tool for civility and emotional regulation.
